question: Which of the following is a correct statement with respect to the the term CRISPR/CAS9 sometimes seen in news?
option1: It is a technology for gene-editing
option2: It is the name of the newly found asteroid in space
option3: It is a spacecraft designed by NASA
option4: It is a Satellite constellation of China
answer: It is a technology for gene-editing
explanation: First option is the correct answer.CRISPR/CAS9 is a new gene-editing technology that promises to revolutionize the genetics field. Using this technology, genes of any living organism can be edited at a faster and cheaper rate than the present technologies. By comparison, older gene-editing tools are cumbersome, inaccurate
